r.s: An efficient and fast xlsx file export extension.
r.d: An efficient and fast xlsx file export extension for PHP. - Quickly export xlsx files in php projects. - Export xlsx files under fixed memory. - Insert a calculation formula in an xlsx file. - Insert a local picture in an xlsx file. - Merging cells and cell styles.
r.n: - FEAT freeze panes - FEAT set font - Refactor format background
